entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
